top_stories.title: Agent Skills for Large Language Models: Architecture, Acquisition, Security, and the Path Forward
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.12430v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The transition from monolithic language models to modular, skill-equipped agents marks a defining shift in how large language models (LLMs) are deployed in practice. Rather than encoding all procedural knowledge within model weights, agent skills -- composable packages of instructions, code,
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Agent orchestration is emerging as a new software abstraction layer.
top_stories.primary_risk: Debugging complexity and cascading failures in agentic systems.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: End-to-end automation of complex cognitive workflows.

top_stories.title: IBM and UC Berkeley Diagnose Why Enterprise Agents Fail Using IT-Bench and MAST
top_stories.summary: Hugging Face Blog announced 'IBM and UC Berkeley Diagnose Why Enterprise Agents Fail Using IT-Bench and MAST', highlighting new developments relevant to AI researchers and practitioners.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Agent orchestration is emerging as a new software abstraction layer.

top_stories.title: Google DeepMind wants to know if chatbots are just virtue signaling
top_stories.summary: Google DeepMind is calling for the moral behavior of large language models—such as what they do when called on to act as companions, therapists, medical advisors, and so on—to be scrutinized with the same kind of rigor as their ability to code or do math. As LLMs improve, people are asking them to play more…
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.
top_stories.primary_risk: Unclear production readiness despite promising early results.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Selective adoption in niche use cases with clear ROI.

top_stories.title: This Defense Company Made AI Agents That Blow Things Up
top_stories.summary: Scout AI is using technology borrowed from the AI industry to power lethal weapons—and recently demonstrated its explosive potential.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Hardware and energy constraints now shape model design decisions.
top_stories.primary_risk: Compute scaling limited by physical and energy infrastructure.

top_stories.title: Nvidia’s Deal With Meta Signals a New Era in Computing Power
top_stories.summary: The days of tech giants buying up discrete chips are over. AI companies now need GPUs, CPUs, and everything in between.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Hardware and energy constraints now shape model design decisions.
top_stories.primary_risk: Compute scaling limited by physical and energy infrastructure.
